block.p: SCOTT-William, 80, of Upper Montclair, NJ, on May 10, 2000. Beloved husband of Beverly (nee Blackwell) Scott, devoted father of Barbara Scott Clark of Algona, IA and William Bradford Scott of Hinsdale, IL. Also survived by seven grandchildren. A funeral service will be held 1PM Tuesday, May 16, at St. Luke's Episcopal Church, 73 S. Fullerton Avenue, Montclair. An Interment will follow at Fairview Cemetery, Westfield. For more information contact Arthur K. Brown, Inc. Bloomfield, NJ.
